synopsis.text:
Paradigm's enigmatic aura is a testament to the city's forgotten history, shrouded in mystery after an event 40 years ago erased the memories of its inhabitants. The city's past, filled with the creation of colossal Megadueses and monstrous entities, continues to haunt the present as its younger generation starts to uncover fragments of the past, leading to the emergence of new threats.

Enter Roger Smith, Paradigm's dapper negotiator and guardian, donning his signature funeral black attire. As he delves deeper into the city's darker side to protect its citizens, Roger's missions often evolve from simple negotiations to high-stakes battles against lurking dangers. Alongside his unwaveringly loyal butler, Norman, and the quick-witted android Dorothy, Roger commands the colossal, jet-black mecha known as The Big O, dispensing justice in a world where nothing is as it seems.

As the layers of Paradigm City's past begin to unfold, Roger's own history becomes increasingly intertwined with the city's uncertain future, raising suspicions and blurring the line between friend and foe. In this gray world, Roger and his allies stand as a beacon of hope, determined to safeguard Paradigm City and unravel the truth behind the memories that were lost.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
